Name: Gythol Granditti: The Crypt of Darkness
About the game: It's a nice sunny day in Tor Borgh and aimless lout Geoff Dandy is woken up by his best mate Dolph Dombardo raging incoherently about going to the Jiggly Swamp. Saving Dolph from doom sets in motion events that lead to one question... What is the Crypt of Darkness? GENRE Old School Inspired RPG Nostalgia GAME INFO Classic RPG gameplay with a Shining Force inspired tactics battle system. Level up system allows you to customize your character stats. PROS  Characters and events change as the adventure unfolds.  Strategy battle system inspired by Shining Force.  No yappers. CONS  4 hour play time.  Needlessly complicated plot.  Not retro style.
